verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי <WH2713> thou hast searched וַתֵּדָֽע׃ <WH3045> me and known

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You יָ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> Thou knowest שִׁבְתִּ֣י <WH3427> my downsitting וְקוּמִ֑י <WH6965> and mine uprising בַּ֥נְתָּה <WH995> thou understandest לְ֝רֵעִ֗י <WH7454> my thought מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> afar off
אָרְחִ֣י <WH734> my path וְרִבְעִ֣י <WH7252> and my lying down זֵרִ֑יתָ <WH2219> Thou compassest וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> [with] all my ways הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃ <WH5532> and art acquainted

כִּ֤י <WH3588> before אֵ֣ין <WH369> there מִ֭לָּה <WH4405> For [there is] not a word בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י <WH3956> in my tongue הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> [but] lo O LORD יָדַ֥עְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest כֻלָּֽהּ׃ <WH3605> all
אָח֣וֹר <WH268> me behind וָקֶ֣דֶם <WH6924> and before צַרְתָּ֑נִי <WH6696> Thou hast beset וַתָּ֖שֶׁת <WH7896> and laid עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and כַּפֶּֽכָה׃ <WH3709> thine hand

[פִּלְאִיָּה כ] (פְּלִ֣יאָֽה <WH6383> secret ק) דַ֣עַת <WH1847> [Such] knowledge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> is too נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה <WH7682> for me it is high לֹא־ <WH3808> not א֥וּכַֽל <WH3201> I cannot לָֽהּ׃
אָ֭נָ֥ה <WH575> Where אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ <WH7307> air וְ֝אָ֗נָה <WH575> Where מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> accept אֶבְרָֽח׃ <WH1272> flee

אִם־ <WH518> If אֶסַּ֣ק <WH5266> If I ascend up שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> into heaven שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> are there אָ֑תָּה <WH859> I וְאַצִּ֖יעָה <WH3331> thou [art] there if I make my bed שְּׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> in hell הִנֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH2005> behold
אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> [If] I take כַנְפֵי־ <WH3671> the wings שָׁ֑חַר <WH7837> of the morning אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה <WH7931> [and] dwell בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> in the uttermost parts יָֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea
גַּם־ <WH1571> Even שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> there יָדְךָ֣ <WH3027> Even there shall thy hand תַנְחֵ֑נִי <WH5148> lead וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי <WH270> shall hold יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> me and thy right hand

וָ֭אֹמַר <WH559> If I say אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Surely the darkness יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <WH7779> shall cover וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> me even the night א֣וֹר <WH216> shall be light בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃ <WH1157> about me

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <WH2822> Yea the darkness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not יַחְשִׁ֪יךְ <WH2821> hideth מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָ <WH4480> to You וְ֭לַיְלָה <WH3915> not from thee but the night כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> as the day יָאִ֑יר <WH215> shineth כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה <WH2825> the darkness כָּאוֹרָֽה׃ <WH219> and the light

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You קָנִ֣יתָ <WH7069> For thou hast possessed כִלְיֹתָ֑י <WH3629> my reins תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי <WH5526> thou hast covered בְּבֶ֣טֶן <WH990> womb אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> me in my mother's

אֽוֹדְךָ֗ <WH3034> I will praise עַ֤ל <WH5921> and כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נוֹרָא֗וֹת <WH3372> thee for I am fearfully נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי <WH6395> [and] wonderfully made נִפְלָאִ֥ים <WH6381> marvellous מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> [are] thy works וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> and [that] my soul יֹדַ֥עַת <WH3045> knoweth מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> right well

לֹא־ <WH3808> was not נִכְחַ֥ד <WH3582> was not hid עָצְמִ֗י <WH6108> My substance מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ <WH4480> at אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> When עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> from thee when I was made בַסֵּ֑תֶר <WH5643> in secret רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי <WH7551> [and] curiously wrought בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <WH8482> in the lowest parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

גָּלְמִ֤י ׀ <WH1564> my substance yet being unperfect רָ֘א֤וּ <WH7200> did see עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> Thine eyes וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> and in סִפְרְךָ֮ <WH5612> and in thy book כֻּלָּ֪ם <WH3605> were all יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ <WH3789> all [my members] were written יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> [which] in continuance יֻצָּ֑רוּ <WH3335> were fashioned [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֖ו <WH3808> not ק) אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> when [as yet there was] none בָּהֶֽם׃

וְלִ֗י מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּקְר֣וּ <WH3365> How precious רֵעֶ֣יךָ <WH7454> also are thy thoughts אֵ֑ל <WH410> unto me O God מֶ֥ה <WH4100> How עָ֝צְמוּ <WH6105> how great רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH7218> is the sum

אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם <WH5608> [If] I should count מֵח֣וֹל <WH2344> than the sand יִרְבּ֑וּן <WH7235> them they are more in number הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי <WH6974> when I awake וְעוֹדִ֥י <WH5750> I am still עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

אִם־ <WH518> O תִּקְטֹ֖ל <WH6991> Surely thou wilt slay אֱל֥וֹהַּ ׀ <WH433> O God רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> the wicked וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> men דָ֝מִ֗ים <WH1818> from me therefore ye bloody ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> depart מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they יֹ֭אמְרֻךָ <WH559> For they speak לִמְזִמָּ֑ה <WH4209> against thee wickedly נָשֻׂ֖א <WH5375> take לַשָּׁ֣וְא <WH7723> [thy name] in vain עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6145> [and] thine enemies

הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <WH8130> Do not I hate יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> them O LORD אֶשְׂנָ֑א <WH8130> that hate וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ <WH8618> with those that rise up אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃ <WH6962> thee? and am not I grieved
תַּכְלִ֣ית <WH8503> them with perfect שִׂנְאָ֣ה <WH8135> hatred שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים <WH8130> I hate לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים <WH341> I count them mine enemies הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> have become לִֽי׃
חָקְרֵ֣נִי <WH2713> Search אֵ֭ל <WH410> me O God וְדַ֣ע <WH3045> and know לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> my heart בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי <WH974> try וְדַ֣ע <WH3045> me and know שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃ <WH8312> my thoughts

וּרְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> And see אִם־ <WH518> if דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> way עֹ֥צֶב <WH6090> if [there be any] wicked בִּ֑י וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <WH5148> in me and lead בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> me in the way עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> everlasting
